entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test failure: Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_49982/test49982/test49982.sh #91096
  • Got ExecutionEngineException - although it is marked as obsolete and not supposed to be thrown #91087
  • `Http2_MultipleConnectionsEnabled` test failures #91075
    8.0.0
  • Options generator perf improvements #91073
    9.0.0
  • Add AOT-compatible XUnit runner #91069
    8.0.0
  • Codepage GB18030 does not implement the latest version of the standard GB18030-2022 #91068
    Future
  • .NET SDK on Ubuntu 18.04.6 libnethost.a contains inexisting libstdc++ symbol #91067
  • [mono] AOT error: Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/mini/method-to-ir.c:6456, condition `!sig->has_type_parameters' not met #91066
    8.0.0
  • native aot regression in .net 8.0 #91065
  • EncryptedXml fails to decrypt element encrypted by a X509 certificate referenced by a negative issuer serial #91064
    9.0.0
  • CodeDom - method invocation on a string with length in a range of 80 to 256 chars or above 1500 chars #91060
  • System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException: A connection attempt failed because the connected party did not properly respond after a period of time, or established connection failed because connected host has failed to respond. #91052
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-rc.1.23415.7] videoduplicatefinder fail to import Scan Result with System.InvalidOperationException #91048
  • Specific Win10/11 Proxysettings cause wrong result in WebRequest.DefaultWebProxy.GetProxy(...) #91045
  • Creating symbolic links is broken when paths are virtualized #91044
    Future
  • Microsoft.NET.HostModel.Tests failing with "No space left on device" #91039

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Sytem.Net.NameResolution lib support lookup diversiform DNS types #91051
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/opt/Vectorization/UnrollEqualsStartsWIth/UnrollEqualsStartsWIth.dll #86265
    8.0.0
  • Read files generated by obsolete BinaryFormatter #88316
    Future
  • Microsoft.NET.CrossGen.targets: stop using legacy runtime graph #90977
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'm_store->TypeGet() == m_src->TypeGet()' #91062
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!"Write to unaliased local overlaps outstanding read"' during 'Rationalize IR' #91056
    8.0.0
  • Question: `System.Diagnostics.ActivitySamplingResult` usage #91070
  • System.Memory.Tests.Span.StringSearchValuesTests failing with "Exit code was 1 but it should have been 42" #90945
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 76 Regressions from tracking VectorT as "optimistic" for crossgen2 #87486
    8.0.0
  • Prevent CS0121 (ambiguous method calls) resulting from config binding source gen #86363
    8.0.0
  • Add test for successfully matching current RID when reading an empty RID graph #86250
    9.0.0
  • Create custom InlineArray marshaller for `LibraryImport` generator #86572
    8.0.0
  • Error in DefaultHttpClientFactory timer method #91053
    8.0.0
  • MonoInterpreter doesn't correctly handle overshifting of a vector #89938
    8.0.0
  • [Long Running Test] 'System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SendReceive_SyncForceNonBlocking.SendRecv_Stream_TCP' #89784
    9.0.0
  • AggressiveOptimization is reported as Tier1 #90490
    9.0.0
  • [.NET 6] System.IO.Compression.Native has incorrect file version #91055
  • [API Proposal]: Simplify IEnumerable implementation #91043
  • cross build win-x64 on macOS: app.manifest requireAdministrator not working #91047
  • Upgrade the Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.* version to use compiler interceptors for source gen #90849
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] perf pipeline broken - `Unable to determine the .NET SDK used for net8.0` on `main` #91011
    9.0.0
  • Assembly.Location returns `/` instead of the actual path intermittently #90657
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch HostVersionCompatibility test to use 6.0 as old runtime #91098
    area-Host
  • [release/8.0] Fix stack_limit handling #91095
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Recommend [In] and [Out] attributes on array parameters #91094
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Use xunit.assert fork in dotnet/runtime #91091
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Use RuntimeIdentifierGraphPath if available in runtime copy of Microsoft.NET.CrossGen.targets #91090
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Skip Create(ToScalar(Dot(...))) transformation on mismatched types #91089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Fix physical promotion creating overlapping local uses #91088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Strip singlefilehost before publishing if it was built with symbols #91086
    area-Setup
  • JIT: add ability to pad profile counters and adjust scalable count th… #91081
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • New Microsoft.BCL.Numerics package #91074
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #91072
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #91071
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] [mono] Handle enum return type when inlining CreateInstance #91061
    Servicing-consider, blocked, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [mono] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call JIT icall to handle static virtual methods #91059
    Servicing-consider, blocked, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [browser] Update browser template to use Wasm SDK #91046
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Wraping both declaration and definition in #ifndef DISABLE_LOGGING. #91042
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Fix JIT_ByRefWriteBarrier unwinding on macOS x64 #91076
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Suppress credscan warnings in X.509 test files #91080
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2251942 #91082
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Don't allocate jiterpreter AOT tables unless AOT was enabled at build time #90978
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/8.0] `PEImage` should not permit `m_path` field mutation #91085
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use RuntimeIdentifierGraphPath if available in runtime copy of Microsoft.NET.CrossGen.targets #91077
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix stack_limit handling #90937
    area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Add a dependency on dotnet/installer to get the latest #90904
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Skip Create(ToScalar(Dot(...))) transformation on mismatched types #91063
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix physical promotion creating overlapping local uses #91058
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve enum documentation #88191
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Adding missing System.Buffers documentation #90891
    needs-area-label
  • `PEImage` should not permit `m_path` field mutation #90753
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Upgrade all VMs to AMD64 Ubuntu 22.04 #86194
    area-Infrastructure
  • Disable RemoteExecutor SearchValues tests on LinuxBionic #90954
    area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • Suppress credscan warnings in X.509 test files #91041
    area-System.Security
  • Add test for using fallback RID when reading an empty RID graph #91040
    area-Host
  • [main] Forward port metrics tests #91026
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • [release/8.0] wasm-tools: Fix workload manifest MSI ProductVersion generation #91023
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.22
  • [release/7.0] wasm-tools: Fix workload manifest MSI ProductVersion generation #91015
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads, 7.0.11
  • [release/6.0] wasm-tools: Fix workload manifest MSI ProductVersion generation #90994
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • Improve ActivitySamplingResult comments #91050
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [Docs][tests] Add Mono Profiled AOT Functional Test and doc #90959
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call JIT icall to handle static virtual methods #90875
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Expose extension points needed by UnityLinker. #90688
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • SendRecv_Stream_TCP: also timeout send/receive, escape xunit sync context #90949
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Clean up AggressiveOpt tier in vm #90504
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove a quirk in fgMorphLeafLocal #90988
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Upgrade MicrosoftCodeAnalysisVersion_LatestVS version to 4.7.0 #91006
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix perf pipeline build with 9.0 sdk #91021
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Delete some dead code` #91018
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • Improve CopySign performance for integer types #90970
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add New Test to Monitor Number of Jitted Methods #90681
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix tmpReg in emitInsTernary #90770
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [Corrected] - Enable Libraries R2R Testing in CI #89405
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Fix a deadlock in NonGC + Profiler API #90847
    area-VM-coreclr
  • NativeAOT SuperPMI collections #91037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Fix calling existing ctor with MethodInvoker; share tests with invokers #90968
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection
  • [NOT READY] GC: Rearrange finalization queue to put freelist in middle #91029
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Improve config binding gen parsing & make generation specs incremental #89587
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • Add boolean field to indicate whether or not the Windows thread pool is being used #90551
    area-System.Threading
  • [browser] download sequence optimization #90388
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Remove TYP_BOOL #90981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] Improve `File.Copy` by using the block copy operation for ReFS on Windows #88695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Check for generic structs in "needs marshalling" check #90836
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Fix UseManagedNtlm linker substitutions #90957
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Implement standalone GC loading in NativeAOT #91038
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add log level and keyword tests for NativeRuntimeEventSource #89816
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Tar: Only treat reparse points marked as junctions or symlinks as actual tar symlinks #89102
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [6.0] Fix session-local named mutex compat issue #90344
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 6.0.22
  • Address warnings from Microsoft.CodeAnalysis upgrade #91034
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono] Handle enum return type when inlining CreateInstance #91008
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Implement IDirectoryContents on PhysicalDirectoryInfo #91024
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution
  • [mono][wip] Test linux-x64 full AOT llvm job #91019
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Remove --skip-unresolved from illink #91007
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [RISC-V] Fix MarshalStructAsLayoutSeq #90719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix nullability annotations of MemberDescriptor.AttributeArray #91022
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Upgrade our TFM to net9.0 #90880
    area-Infrastructure
  • Move event pipe utf8/utf16 string conversion functions to shared event pipe code #90774
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Add tests for `GetInterfaceMap` on static interface methods #90518
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Optimization setting is not passed to the linker #2357
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable tests and fix bugs #2307

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] More miscellaneous fixes #2388

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] WASI fixes #2386

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Rewrite exception handling to support nested dispatch #2374
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet new install should not pull down pre-release packages by default #34911
  • Having a tests project in a subfolder of the main application causes a recursive generation of artifacts #34914
  • .NET MAUI quick up-to-date check is broken because launchSettings.json is erroneously included in expected #34888

Closed

  • [API Compat] Changing a member return type should be detected as a breaking change #34864
    9.0.1xx
  • Regression - NET8 Preview1 SDK won't publish trimmed self contained solution with netstandard2.1 projects #30948
    .NET 8.0
  • [API Compat] Add extension method validation #34824

PullRequests

Created

  • Prefer docker tool when both podman and docker are present #34909
    Area-Containers, 8.0.1xx
  • Add internal _UseManagedNtlm feature switch #34903
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #34898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Fix CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName test by using CurrentCulture … #34893
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Validate member types #34872
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Enable Windows thread pool config switch via Project file #34889
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable transitive pinning #34387
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Removing stale msbuild feed #34899
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Validate "this" extension methods and limit visibility #34871
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow PublishSingleFile and PublishAot specified simultaneously #34419
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #34854
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #34394
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2251820 #34880
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update our TFM support and error messaging for 17.7 #34585
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Containers: prefer starting the app using 'dotnet <assembly.dll>'. #34863
    untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Collection expressions: generic method type inference not working when spreading IEnumerable<T> #69706
    17.8
  • Collection expressions: conversion error reported for spread of `dynamic` type #69704
  • Format Document should ignore Visual Studio options when both EnforceCodeStyleInBuild and IDE0055 are enabled #69702
  • Incorrect error formatting for generic attribute missing errors #69700
    Backlog
  • C# compiler hangs in V17.7.2 but works in V17.6.4 #69697
  • Format Document (^K^D) deletes needed line continuation underscores in VB.NET #69696
  • Only run Source-Generator driver in external process. #69694
  • Collection expressions: Report warning when the compiler generates a heap allocation for a ref struct #69693
    17.8
  • Remove WellKnownMembers.System_ReadOnlySpan_T__op_Implicit_ReadOnlySpan_T_Array if not needed #69692
    17.8

Closed

  • [BUG] C# class extensions are not suggested for auto-complete. #69576
    August
  • Completion for global using static attempts to insert a regular using #68791
    Post GA
  • Web Application with specific config not analysed by MsBuildWorkspace #69654
  • Convert to binary/hex is suggested even when it makes the code more complex #69637
    Backlog
  • RenameAnnotation does not activate rename mode (when added to type parameter of local function) #17560
    Backlog
  • VBCSCompiler: Infinite build time #69672
  • CompletionRequest failed in C# DevKit #68704
    August

PullRequests

Created

  • Add granular opt-in property for interceptors #69712
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add to assembly crossgen to avoid JIT increase #69711
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Work around restore issue #69710
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix vsix dependency #69709
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix the ArgumentOutOfRangeException in inline rename #69708
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #69707
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update the C# syntax generator to use a few more modern C# constructs. #69703
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Produce a warning for redundant patterns #69698
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Bind fully-typed lambda only once for error recovery #69695
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix import completion in LSP workspace #69691
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update collection expression tests for .NET 8 #69705
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.8 #69701
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix issue where dedenting a namespace did not dedent raw string literals #69684
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Lower the priority of 'Convert number' and have nested options when there is a long list. #69683
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move to 8.0 preview 7 ref assemblies in compiler tests #69614
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix CSharpSyntaxContext when dealing with UTF8 string literals #69650
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce overhead due to lsp semantic token refresh requests. #69690
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Adjust OptProf config #69681
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: use inline arrays for collection expressions with span target types #69412
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next

Updated

  • Run design time builds out-of-process #69616
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Provide dedicated classifications for embedded C# in test code. #61197
    Area-IDE
  • Collection expression conversions: check elements are convertible #69627
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Code refactor action: Remove redundant else statement #68529
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Pool lexed token arrays in SyntaxParser. #69499
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Identify and fix simple using statements in top level expressions #69688
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Improve interpolated string handler compilation error #69671
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.8
  • Rename Razor compiler assemblies #69655
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid static overhead for switch-over-string optimization #69673
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2251760 #69366
  • Make the [Experimental] warning as error by default #69639
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update TFM in tests to net8.0 #69669
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Published size regression: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapivanilla #50324
  • Published size regression: basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #50323
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #50322
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #50321
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, fortunes #50320
  • Intermittent 'IIS AspNetCore Module V2 throws failed to load coreclr' #50317
  • Overriding ApplicationName on Integration Tests #50316
  • PeriodicTimer bug when cancelling with token #50310
  • Blazor razor formatting bug #50309
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, json #50307
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #50306

Updated

    area-blazor
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50281
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Make MapIdentityApi DTOs public #50247
    area-identity
  • HttpLogging redaction and enrichment #50163
    area-middleware, 8.0-rc2
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2251757 #49575

  • Add ProblemDetials.Extensions to ControllerBase.Problem and ControllerBase.ValidationProblem #50204
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add Platform-specific properties for Drag and Drop Gesture Recognizer EventArgs #16992
  • Templated FlyoutItem isn't displaying after visibility is toggled back on #16991
    Backlog
  • ClearButton Not Functioning in Android Platform with Margin Property in .NET MAUI #16980
    Backlog
  • Dropping files into CollectionView not working on Mac Catalyst #16979
    Backlog
  • PanGestureRecognizer is not working in Android #16978
  • (App Name).build.appxrecipe" does not exist. You may need to build your project #16975
  • [MAUI] RefreshView C7 Pull down in the purple view isn't activate the RefreshView on Surface. #16974
  • [MAUI] RefreshView C4 RefreshColor is not displayed correctly on Surface when refreshing. #16973
  • CharacterSpacing is not working on iOS after clearing textbox #16971
    Backlog
  • Windows application frame #16969

Closed

  • DisplayAlert Displaying Beneath PopupPage (Mopups) on iOS #16321
    .NET 8 GA
  • Flyout is not refreshing when item visibility is changed #10468
    Backlog
  • Label InputTransparent property in MAUI XAML is being ignored in windows only. #16831
    Backlog
  • How to remove the radius at the edges in Shell Flyout in MAUI #16832
  • Loaded and Unloaded events are not fired correctly #13245
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] iOS: Shell navigation crashes the app with SIGSEGV #16860
    .NET 8 GA
  • Label that HorizontalOptions is "EndAndExpand" in HorizontalStackLayout are not working #16972
    Backlog
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Bug: Android & iOS - Binding inside of DataTemplate not working if swipeView is present #16855
  • Incorrect sample code on https://github.com/dotnet/maui/wiki/Xamarin.Forms----MAUI.Controls-Layout-Differences #16984
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.6.8686] [WinUI] CollectionView throws an exception after adding a second item #16320
    .NET 8 GA
  • SetSite failed for package [Microsoft.VisualStudio.Editor.Implementation.EditorPackage]Source #16775
  • Black splash screen on iOS device and simulator #16945
  • Random empty rows on ListView #16669
    Backlog
  • Unable to create a maui (v7) app on windows and target iOS #16915
  • InputTransparent logic/intended behavior #7489
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Shell.TitleView still doesn't work in iPhone even with 7.0.92 #16707
  • PhoneDialer not working in Windows #16788
  • MAUI WebView does not execute JS chart lib function on Mac #14394
    .NET 8 GA

PullRequests

Created

  • [workload] Move default item updates to workload sdk #16990
  • [android] fix DI registration for Frame, ListView, TableView #16989
  • Add a template for multi-head maui apps #16988
  • Fix Android text alignment in migrated projects #16986
  • Update Page API docs #16981
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add SetupContent/UnhookContent to WinUI ListView.CellControl #16977
    area/ListView

Merged

  • Present to UIWindow associated with passed in page #16983
  • Fix so updating FlyoutItemIsVisible hides/shows shell menu item #16942
    area/shell 🐢, .NET 8 GA
  • [net8.0] Bring latest changes from main #16976
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [android] update AOT profile for .NET 8.0.0-rc.1.23419.3 #16963

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Specifying enum typed discriminator on an entity type results in opaque ArgumentExceptions at query time #31547
  • EntityFramework 6.4.4 Add-Migration "Unrecognized command or argument 'VB'" #31546
  • EF Core upgrades to a distributed transaction when the TransactionScope contains multiple dbcontexts even if enlist is false #31544

Closed

  • Issue Connecting to Postgres Pgpool Server with Entity Framework Core #31545

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw from 2.1.6-pre20230809203314 to 2.1.6 #31548
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Add support for DATA_COMPRESSION and SORT_IN_TEMPDB SQL Server index options #30831
    waiting-for-response
  • 31355: SQLite: Add EF.Functions.Unhex #31454
    waiting-for-response
